elements.text: You're visiting the doctor for the first time since you started using your new walker. You're unsure about how well you will walk in a crowded waiting room. As you rush to check in at the front desk, you press down on a stranger's foot with the walker, leaving you feeling...

elements.name: Crowded Waiting Room_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
